Author: Visual Studio Code
Title: Beyond the Keynote: VS Code at GitHub Universe 2025
Description:
Subscribe - https://www.vscodepodcast.com

What does it look like for VS Code to be an AI-native editor? How is it evolving with agents running locally in the editor, in a CLI, in the cloud, or even from other companies? Pierce breaks down every part of what was announced for VS Code at GitHub Universe and goes behind the scenes of his part of the keynote.

Episode Links: GitHub Universe Updates in VS Code - https://github.blog/changelog/2025-10-28-github-copilot-in-visual-studio-code-gets-upgraded/ Mission Control - https://github.blog/changelog/2025-10-28-a-mission-control-to-assign-steer-and-track-copilot-coding-agent-tasks/ GitHub Universe Opening Keynote - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P6Va0\_KILi4 Open Source AI Editor: Second Milestone - https://code.visualstudio.com/blogs/2025/11/04/openSourceAIEditorSecondMilestone A unified experience for all coding agents - https://code.visualstudio.com/blogs/2025/11/03/unified-agent-experience

Chapters: 00:00 - Intro & Experience at Universe 03:30 - AI-Native Editor 10:00 - How coding is evolving 12:35 - Planning Agent 18:30 - Subagents in Chat 21:10 - Custom Agents 30:15 - Cloud Agents & Agent Sessions 38:00 - VS Code - An Open Platform
